comments:
I'm using BIRT 2.1.2 to generate reports (RunAndRenderTask) and that works pretty well. Yesterday I gave a try to 2.2 RC0 and I hit the following assertion:

org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Error happened while running the report
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.doRun(RunAndRenderTask.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:124)
[...]

Caused by: java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.AbstractContent.<init>(AbstractContent.java:108)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.ImageContent.<init>(ImageContent.java:58)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.ReportContent.createImageContent(ReportContent.java:261)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.processExtendedContent(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:764)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.processExtendedContent(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:683)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.visitForeign(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.ForeignContent.accept(ForeignContent.java:59)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.localize(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:102)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.l18n.LocalizedReportItemExecutor.execute(LocalizedReportItemExecutor.java:36)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layoutChildren(HTMLPageLM.java:125)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layout(HTMLPageLM.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLReportLayoutEngine.layout(HTMLReportLayoutEngine.java:88)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.doRun(RunAndRenderTask.java:198)
	... 50 more

I cannot (yet) provide my report by can do some debugging if needed.
Under debugger I can see that parameter 'content' is of type ForeignContent.
*** Bug 191414 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

remove error assertion in AbstractContent.java
Fixed.

traces.message: Error happened while running the report
